title: Mystic River 2003 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
Jimmy. Dave. Sean. Friends who grew up together in the middle class Boston, but who followed different paths after a terrible tragedy. Years later, brutal events reconnect them. Katie, Jimmy's teenage daughter is brutally murdered. Dave seems to have some connection with the crime. Sean, now a cop, scrambles against the clock to solve the crime - before Jimmy takes the law into his own hands. - Working with the adaptation of Brian Helgeland for the novel by Dennis Lehane, the Oscar-winning director Clint Eastwood shapes a masterpiece, a thoughtful thriller, dealing with issues such as family, friends and innocence lost. Sean Penn, Tim Robbins and Kevin Bacon interpret the main trio, joining Laurence Fishburne, Marcia Gay Harden and Laura Linney in a powerful cast. Nominated for five Oscars, including Best Picture. Winner in the categories Best Actor (Sean Penn) and Best Supporting Actor (Tim Robbins).
